abstract.p: Leonard Casper letter on July 16 issue about race in America notes reputable anthropologists believe race is artificial, societal idea that contributes to polarization

block.p: Any reputable anthropologist will tell you that ''race'' has no scientific basis but is an artificial, societal construct. Most of the people you interviewed equated skin color with race, so they regularly referred to ''blacks'' and ''whites'' without recognizing that in keeping alive these bite-size but false distinctions, they have contributed to the irreconcilable polarization at the heart of racism.
